title: Left side Touchscreen is not responsive properly Pixel 3xl. Performed hard reset but no luck
content: Two days ago, part of my left touchscreen stopped responding. I need to press quite hard and in a very precise spot for the screen to react. I have performed a complete hard reset but no lock. The problem is still there.  I haven't dropped the phone and the screen is not damaged whatsoever! Any ideas how to fix it?
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
